app_icon_main.style: modern iOS app icon style, soft 3D design with gentle curves, pastel color palette, smooth gradients, professional healthcare aesthetic, clean and minimalist, friendly and trustworthy appearance, perfect for App Store presentation
app_icon_main.scene: a baby footprint with a small heart symbol representing baby health tracking, placed centrally on a soft cream background with subtle depth, warm and welcoming atmosphere, gentle shadows creating professional depth

composition.layout: center-focused balanced composition with proper padding
composition.camera_angle: slight front-facing perspective with subtle depth
composition.depth_of_field: medium focus on main object, soft background blur
composition.motion_feel: calm, stable, gentle curves for approachability

elements.object_style: soft realistic 3D, rounded edges, minimalist pediatric design, gentle proportions
elements.surface_detail: smooth matte finish with subtle highlights, soft specular reflections, no harsh edges
elements.shadow_type: soft ambient occlusion shadow, gentle drop shadow for depth
elements.lighting: soft natural daylight with warm glow, gentle rim lighting, no harsh contrasts

formatting.background: subtle gradient from light peach #FFEBD9 to cream #FFF8F0, soft radial glow behind main object, calming atmosphere
formatting.corner_radius: designed for iOS rounded corners, leave space for automatic masking
formatting.output: no text, no logo, no borders, no UI elements, pure icon design
